jp.ossc.nimbus.util.converter

インタフェース ReversibleConverter

  • すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    Converter
    既知のサブインタフェースのリスト:
    BindingStreamConverter, FormatConverter, HankakuZenkakuConverter, PaddingConverter, StreamConverter, StreamStringConverter
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    AbstractCharacterConverter, AbstractStringConverter, AlphabetCharacterConverter, AlphabetStringConverter, BASE64StringConverter, BeanJSONConverter, BouncyCastleCipherCryptService, BufferedStreamConverter, CipherCryptService, CustomCharacterConverter, CustomConverter, CustomStringConverter, DataSetHtmlConverter, DataSetJSONConverter, DataSetXMLConverter, DataSetXpathConverter, DateFormatConverter, DecimalFormatConverter, DOMHTMLConverter, DOMXMLConverter, HankakuZenkakuCharacterConverter, HankakuZenkakuStringConverter, JSONEscapeConverter, KatakanaCharacterConverter, KatakanaHiraganaCharacterConverter, KatakanaHiraganaStringConverter, KatakanaStringConverter, MessageDigestStringConverter, MimeBASE64StringConverter, NullConverter, NumberCharacterConverter, NumberStringConverter, PaddingByteArrayConverter, PaddingStringConverter, PropertyEditorConverter, RecordCSVConverter, RecordListCSVConverter, SerializeStreamConverter, SQLDateConverter, StringStreamConverter, SymbolCharacterConverter, SymbolStringConverter, TimeFormatConverter, TimestampFormatConverter, UnicodeHexBufferedReader, UrlBASE64StringConverter

    public interface ReversibleConverter
extends Converter
    可逆コンバータのインタフェース。

    作成者:
    M.Takata
